scripts.build: browserify --debug  --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee |   exorcist lib/zxcvbn.js.map >| lib/zxcvbn.js
scripts.watch: watchify --debug -v --standalone zxcvbn -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t uglifyify src/main.coffee -o 'exorcist lib/zxcvbn.js.map >| lib/zxcvbn.js'
